articles.title: 4 questions facing Bruins as they return from Olympic break
articles.description:
The Bruins have to play 25 games over the final eight weeks of the 2025-26 season.

articles.title: Fire erupts at MCI-Norfolk prison, no major injuries reported
articles.description:
Three incarcerated individuals were treated for smoke inhalation, and one staff member went to the hospital as a precautionary measure.

articles.title: Stephen A. Smith endorses Jaylen Brown as an MVP candidate
articles.description:

articles.title: Harvard professor on leave as college investigates ties to Jeffrey Epstein
articles.description:
Jeffrey Epstein donated $6.5 million to Harvard to support Martin Nowak, who also visited Epstein's island in 2013, per emails released by the DOJ.

The post Harvard professor on leave as college investigates ties to Jeffrey Epstein appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Malden educator, basketball coach charged with rape in incident involving high school student, officials say
articles.description:
The arrested employee, an educator and basketball coach with the district, was placed on leave in the wake of the allegations.

articles.title: Red Sox’ Wilyer Abreu explains viral broken-bat check swing
articles.description:

articles.title: All Mass. customers should have power fully restored by end of Friday night, Eversource says
articles.description:
“Currently right now we have about 160,000 customers that are out [of power],” President of Electric Operations for Eversource Doug Foley said in a press conference Wednesday.

The post All Mass. customers should have power fully restored by end of Friday night, Eversource says appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Team USA captain Hilary Knight reacts to Trump’s ‘distasteful’ joke about U.S. women’s hockey team
articles.description:

articles.title: Mike Vrabel on AJ Brown, Stefon Diggs’ future and Patriots’ free agency approach
articles.description:
"We want to have a plan," Vrabel said. "And we want to bring in really talented players that we have a vision for, that we also believe in the type of character that they have as we build this team and improve on what we did this year.

articles.title: Charania: Jayson Tatum a ‘full-go’ during Celtics’ 5-on-5 scrimmages
articles.description:
